original_text: When anyone among you has troubles, you must help each other. If you do that, you will be obeying Christ's rule.
korean_text: 너희가 짐을 서로 지라 그리하여 그리스도의 법을 성취하라

sentences.original_text: When anyone among you has troubles
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 누군가 어려움을 겪을 때

sentences.original_text: you will be obeying Christ's rule
